overview:
Brian is a founder of Zave Networks and the architect of its technology platform. He has over 20 years experience in Information Technology, Operations and Management Consulting for Start-ups and Fortune 500 Companies.

Brian has led strategic planning, architecture, product and enterprise software development, hardware and data center management, standards and methodology, as well as operational process improvement initiatives for Sprint PCS, Lucent Technologies, ParcPlace Systems, and CSX. As a Management Consultant, his clients included IBM, GTE, MCI, and Ameritech.

Brian holds a BS in applied mathematics, a BS in computer science and statistics, and an MBA from the University of Texas at San Antonio.
